description: Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2 (Approved Plans), 3 (Construction and Environmental Management Plan), 4 (Construction Logistics Plan), 5 (Contaminated Land), 6 (Water), 10 (Drainage Strategy), 13 (Cycle Storage - Staff), 14 (Cycle Storage - Visitors), 19 (Ventilation Strategy), 20 (Energy Strategy), 23 (Internal Noise Levels), 25 (Building Heights) and 26 (Number of Hotel Bedrooms) of planning permission 18/0053/FUMOPDC dated 8 October 2018 (as amended by 20/0038/NMAOPDC dated 8 April 2020) for the 'Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new hotel (Class C1 use), including an ancillary cafe, meeting facilities and fitness suite, together with associated front and back of house facilities, cycle parking, internal servicing bay, bin stores, plant and other associated works' to primarily: increase the number of hotel rooms from 162 beds to 190 beds; increase the maximum height of the scheme from 13 storey to 15 storeys (46.5 to 52.4 metres above ground level); and changes to the external facade treatments (Out of Borough Consultation from the Old Oak and Park Royal Development Corporation)
